text:
He said, “I feel like I am flying, Marriage is like the best thing that’s ever happened to me. Wow, I feel some kind of magic, some kind of power, I feel invincible, you know in superhero movies, that moment when the suit comes on, I feel like marriage has done that to me. I feel like I’ve grown up now, finally, I am a man. I feel grounded, I feel secure. I’m really loving it, it’s been only 10 or 15 days, it’s so nice, it’s so lovely. I would highly recommend it.”
Every character was sketched to perfect with the right mix of drama, emotions and humor. Today, as the film completes 17 years of its release, let's take you on a nostalgia trip.
The film helmed by Zoya Akhtar is loosely inspired by the life of rapper Divine, has been selected as part of the Berlinale Special programme.
Nothing much has changed for either of the two and their marriage looks easy-breezy as they juggle between partying, chilling, having fun and enjoying their lives as a married couple.
